programme.title: 8 Mile
programme.desc: Drama starring rap artist Eminem and Kim Basinger. Jimmy "Rabbit" Smith is stuck in a dead-end factory job in a tough area of Detroit where he lives with his highly strung mother and little sister. Jimmy longs to break out of this bleak existence by making it as a rapper, but his road to stardom is going to be a rocky one Curtis Hanson - Director, Curtis Hanson - Director Marshall Mathers - Jimmy \Rabbit\ Smith Kim Basinger - Stephanie Brittany Murphy - Alex Mekhi Phifer - Future Evan Jones - Cheddar Bob Omar Benson Miller - Sol George Eugene Byrd - Wink De'Angelo Wilson - DJ Iz Marshall Mathers - Jimmy \Rabbit\ Smith Kim Basinger - Stephanie Brittany Murphy - Alex Mekhi Phifer - Future Evan Jones - Cheddar Bob Omar Benson Miller - Sol George Eugene Byrd - Wink De'Angelo Wilson - DJ Iz.

programme.title: The Flintstones
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Drama, Fantasy, Children's, Animation ║ 1994 ║ U
programme.desc: Comedy based on the cartoon series, starring John Goodman and Elizabeth Perkins, and featuring Elizabeth Taylor. Helped by his best friend and neighbour, Barney Rubble, Fred Flintstone wins a job promotion at the local quarry. programme.title: The Flintstones in Viva Rock Vegas
programme.sub-title: Comedy, Family, Fantasy, Drama, Romance, Sci Fi, Children's ║ 2000 ║ PG
programme.desc: Comedy prequel based on the cartoon series, starring Mark Addy, Stephen Baldwin, Kristen Johnston and Jane Krakowski. programme.title: The Dark Knight
programme.desc: Oscar-winning action fantasy starring Christian Bale, Aaron Eckhart and Heath Ledger. Now that Gotham City has its very own masked protector, the heads of the underworld find it increasingly difficult to operate. But then they receive an offer they can't refuse from a garishly attired criminal called the Joker. programme.title: The Polar Express
programme.sub-title: Family, Drama, Animation, Action, Comedy, Fantasy, Musical, Children's, Arts And Culture, Sci Fi ║ 2004 ║ PG
programme.desc: Seasonal animated fantasy featuring Tom Hanks. On Christmas Eve, a young boy lies in bed pondering if Santa Claus really exists. Startled by a thunderous sound, he goes outside to discover a magical train destined for the North Pole. programme.title: Bridget Jones's Diary
programme.desc: Romantic comedy adapted from the bestselling novel by Helen Fielding, starring Renée Zellweger, Colin Firth and Hugh Grant. Weight-obsessed 30-something Bridget Jones is busy lamenting her lack of a good man when two come along at once: her flirtatious boss Daniel Cleaver and uptight childhood friend Mark Darcy. Unfortunately, in typical world-of-Bridget style, the two men have met before, and she finds herself thrust from being a wallflower to the centre of a bizarre love triangle Sharon Maguire - Director, Sharon Maguire - Director Renée Zellweger - Bridget Jones Colin Firth - Mark Darcy Hugh Grant - Daniel Cleaver Jim Broadbent - Bridget's dad Gemma Jones - Bridget's mum Sally Phillips - Sharon Shirley Henderson - Jude James Callis - Tom Embeth Davidtz - Natasha Celia Imrie - Una Alconbury Honor Blackman - Penny Husbands-Bosworth James Faulkner - Uncle Geoffrey Salman Rushdie - Salman Rushdie Patrick Barlow - Julian Neil Pearson - Richard Finch Paul Ross - Mr Sit Up Britain Renée Zellweger - Bridget Jones Colin Firth - Mark Darcy Hugh Grant - Daniel Cleaver Jim Broadbent - Bridget's dad Gemma Jones - Bridget's mum Sally Phillips - Sharon Shirley Henderson - Jude James Callis - Tom Embeth Davidtz - Natasha Celia Imrie - Una Alconbury Honor Blackman - Penny Husbands-Bosworth James Faulkner - Uncle Geoffrey Salman Rushdie - Salman Rushdie Patrick Barlow - Julian Neil Pearson - Richard Finch Paul Ross - Mr Sit Up Britain.

programme.title: Ghost
programme.desc: Romantic drama starring Patrick Swayze, Demi Moore and Whoopi Goldberg. programme.title: The Dark Knight Rises
programme.desc: Action fantasy concluding Christopher Nolan's Batman trilogy, starring Christian Bale, Tom Hardy and Anne Hathaway. There has been no sign of Batman in Gotham City since the defeat of the Joker eight years earlier. programme.title: Mee-Shee: the Water Giant
programme.sub-title: Fantasy, Drama, Action, Family, Children's ║ 2005 ║ PG
programme.desc: A boy is far from happy when his oil executive father cancels their planned holiday to go on a salvage mission at a remote Canadian lake. programme.title: Book of Love
programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. But when the book suddenly becomes a surprise hit in Mexico, his publicist insists he travel there on a promotional tour. Upon arrival, a confused Henry discovers the reason behind the popularity - Mexican translator Maria has rewritten the dull book as a steamy erotic story. programme.title: Charlie Wilson's War
programme.desc: Biographical comedy drama starring Tom Hanks, Julia Roberts and Philip Seymour Hoffman. In 1980s Washington, charismatic Texas politician Charles Wilson is notorious for his hard-drinking, drug-taking and womanising lifestyle, earning the nickname "Good Time Charlie". But the seemingly carefree congressman is stirred into action when socialite Joanne Herring draws his attention to the plight of the Afghan people suffering under Soviet occupation. programme.desc: Young, uptight and unsuccessful English writer Henry's latest novel sells poorly. programme.title: Gunpowder Milkshake
programme.desc: In her turbulent life as a professional assassin, Scarlet was cruelly forced to abandon her daughter Sam and go on the run. Years later, despite the estrangement, Sam has also grown up into a cold-blooded hitwoman. After a high-stakes mission spins out of control, Sam has no choice but to go rogue. This ultimately leads her back to her mother and her former sidekicks, who join forces against those who took everything from them. programme.title: The Cinema List: Sky Original Thrillers
programme.desc: Love a thriller, but unsure what you want to watch next? Then join us for this fast-paced rundown of the best Sky Original thrillers, from The Desperate Hour to The Independent and beyond.

programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killer's enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. programme.title: To Catch a Killer
programme.desc: Eleanor is a talented but troubled young rookie detective wrestling with the demons of her past, when she is called to the scene of a brutal mass shooting - the work of a new and terrifying murderer. The police and FBI launch a nationwide manhunt, but are thwarted at every turn by the killer's enigmatic, and unprecedented behaviour. Despite her lack of experience, Eleanor is drawn deeper into the case as she, and her newfound mentor, realise that she may be the only person, given her own tortured psyche, who can understand the mind of this singular killer. programme.title: Please Don't Destroy: The Treasure of Foggy Mountain
programme.desc: Directionless twenty something Ben Patterson lives with pals John and Martin. All three work at the Trout Plus outdoor goods emporium run by Ben's overbearing father, Farley. A random social media post intimates that an old compass, which Ben, John and Martin found as children, could be the missing link to discovering a bust of Marie Antoinette worth an estimated 100million US dollars. Ben resolves to earn his father's respect by unearthing the booty. programme.desc: (UK TV Premiere) A recovery agent and a designer become part of a big Bollywood event in New York, where chaos ensues, changing their lives forever.

programme.title: RRR
programme.desc: RRR is the blockbuster movie of 2022 it is most expensive Indian film to date also nominated for the Oscar for Best Science and Fiction Film and Best Director.

programme.title: Gupt
programme.desc: Kajol won 'Best Performance by an Actor in a Negative Role', Rajiv Rai won 'Best Editing' and Viju Shah won 'Best Background Score' award at the Filmfare Awards 1998.

programme.title: Hello Darling
programme.desc: Three harassed female employees fear they have killed their very much alive boss and try to dispose off the dead body of an unknown male.

programme.title: Laali Ki Shaadi Mein Laaddoo Deewana
programme.desc: Laali gets pregnant with Laddoo's child but he has already left her. Laali then gets engaged to Veer, who is told by his priest to marry a pregnant girl for good fortune.

programme.title: Haryali Aur Raaste
programme.desc: A man's marriage is fixed in his childhood, but he grows up and falls for another woman. He weds the woman of his elders' choice but is unhappy despite having a son.

programme.title: Sirf Tum
programme.desc: A 1999 love story about Deepak (Sanjay Kapoor) and Aarti (Priya Gill) who fall in love without seeing each other. Neha (Sushmita Sen) who also loves Deepak provides the third angle.

programme.title: Thalaivi
programme.desc: A biopic on the late Tamil Nadu Chief Minister J Jayalalithaa.

programme.title: Kedarnath
programme.desc: (Movie @6) Sara Ali Khan won the 'Best Debut Actress' award at the Awards of the International Indian Film Academy 2019, Filmfare Awards 2019 & Screen Awards in 2020.

programme.title: Coolie No. 1
programme.desc: To avenge his insult, Jai Kishen marries Rozario's daughter to Raju, a porter posing as a millionaire. Chaos ensues when Raju conjures a twin brother to support his lies.

programme.title: Khoon Bhari Mang
programme.desc: Rekha won the 'Best Actress' award, Sonu Walia won the 'Best Supporting Actress award and Sanjay Verma won the 'Best Editor' award at the Filmfare Awards 1989.

programme.title: Khoon Bhari Mang
programme.desc: Rekha won the 'Best Actress' award, Sonu Walia won the 'Best Supporting Actress award and Sanjay Verma won the 'Best Editor' award at the Filmfare Awards 1989.

programme.title: Pure Bollywood
programme.desc: Some of the best soundtracks of Bollywood uncut.

programme.title: Mere Pyaare Prime Minister
programme.desc: This movie won Best International Film award in Academy of Science Fiction, Fantasy and Horror Films, USA.

programme.title: Satyagraha
programme.desc: A corporate go-getter sees his priorities shift when a personal tragedy brings him face to face with political corruption. Starring Kareena Kapoor, Amitabh Bachchan and Ajay Devgn.

programme.title: Krantiveer
programme.desc: Nana Patekar won 'Best Actor' award, Dimple Kapadia won 'Best Supporting Actress' and K. K. Singh won 'Best Dialogue' award at the Filmfare Awards 1995.

programme.title: Upkar
programme.desc: 1967 cult classic highlighting the contrast between Indian and Western values in the newly independent state. Stars Manoj Kumar and Asha Parekh.

programme.title: Desh Premee
programme.desc: (1982) Patriot Dinanath is tragically separated from his wife and daughter. His son Raju is into illegal activities. Will Dinanath find out that his son is not what he thinks he is?

programme.title: Army
programme.desc: (Movie @6) A 1994 film about Geeta (Sridevi) who, with a group of young lads, seeks revenge from the dreaded gangster Nagraj (Danny Denzongpa) for killing her husband Arjun (Shahrukh Khan).

programme.title: Satyameva Jayate
programme.desc: This movie praised with many awards like Best Debut - Female, Best Performance by an Actor in a Negative Role, New Musical Sensation - Male, Best Cinematographer.

programme.title: Heer Tey Tedhi Kheer
programme.desc: (R) Fate brings a clumsy but cheerful Heer and DJ, a rigid man, together in marriage. Can Heer overcome the challenge of being a mother-in-law to his three older daughters-in-law?

programme.desc: (R) Gurman gives her son away to her friend Prabhjot and adopts her daughter, Keerat, in his place. Years later, Keerat marries Gurman's biological son. Will Prabhjot accept her as a daughter-in-law?

programme.title: The Nun II
programme.desc: After her harrowing experience in 1950s Romania, Sister Irene moves to France and enjoys a quieter pace of life, guiding fresh-faced Sister Debra. programme.desc: Manchester United welcome Liverpool to Old Trafford in this classic Premier League match from the 2008-09 campaign. It would prove to be a memorable afternoon for the visiting side.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games: B'ming/A.Villa
programme.desc: A classic Premier League clash between Birmingham and Aston Villa in 2002. There was an intense atmosphere at St Andrew's with just a single point separating the bitter rivals.

programme.title: PL Greatest: WBA v Man Utd 2013
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, West Bromwich Albion take on Man Utd back in 2013 in a ten-goal thriller in what was Sir Alex Ferguson's final game in charge.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Cardiff v Liverpool
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Cardiff City take on Liverpool at the Cardiff City Stadium back in 2014, in a match that saw nine goals and a Luis Suarez hat-trick.

programme.title: Best of Wenger: L'pool/Arsenal 09
programme.desc: Remember a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Liverpool and Arsenal play out an absolute thriller at Anfield that saw Arsenal striker Andrey Arshavin steal the show.

programme.title: Best Premier League Goals 95/96
programme.desc: Sky Sports takes a look at some of the best goals from Premier League seasons in years gone by. Here, enjoy some of the best goals from the 95-96 season.

programme.title: Premier League Best Goals 16/17
programme.desc: Sky Sports revisits some of the finest goals to have been scored in the Premier League. Here, some of the best goals and games from across the 2016-17 campaign.

programme.desc: A celebration of the players to have bagged 100 goals or more in the Premier League. This episode features the best goals of Everton and Manchester United's Wayne Rooney.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Arsenal/Spurs 08
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Arsenal meet Tottenham Hotspur in the north London derby in 2008-09 season, in a match that saw a stunning comeback.

programme.title: Best of Wenger: Man U/Arsenal '98
programme.desc: Remember a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Arsenal visit Alex Ferguson's Manchester United at Old Trafford back in the 1997-98 season.

programme.title: PL Greatest: Man Utd/Everton 2012
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic match from the Premier League. Here, Man Utd host Everton at Old Trafford in a captivating eight-goal thriller back in 2012.

programme.title: PL Greatest Games:Newc/Leics '97
programme.desc: A chance to relive a classic Premier League match. Here, Newcastle United host Leicester City in a seven-goal thriller at St James' Park in the 1996-97 season.

programme.desc: A celebration of some of the finest goalscorers in Premier League history. This episode features the best of Thierry Henry's 175 top-flight goals.

programme.desc: A look at some of the most famous, iconic stars to have graced the Premier League. Here, the spotlight is on Argentine forward Carlos Tevez, who enjoyed success with both Manchester clubs.
